name: IceTimer
short_description:
An application to display a schedule of and time short round-robin style matches for up to 30 teams with up to 3 simultaneous matches in play.

Primarily intended for use in Oxford University Alternative Ice Hockey sessions but could easily be modified for use in similar informal sports tournaments.

Match fixture lists generated using Jonathan Rennison's Match Fixture List Generator (matchgen.sourceforge.net). Interface written in Java using Processing (processing.org).
summary: Graphical timer and match scheduler for pick-up ice hockey sessions
